.Currency p: By using #{variable} you can define a number that has to be formatted as a currency. This variable should be in the export of the MyView.vue.
.Currency p:nth-child(5):
Its also posible for the VUE Localization Component to calculate the new value of the amount according to the current exchange rate.
This functon can be enabled by setting enableCurExchange to true in ../localization/conifg.json.
